front.title: A String Representation of LDAP Search Filters

author.organization: University of Michigan, ITD Research Systems

abstract.t: The Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP)defines a network representation of a search filter transmitted to an LDAP server. Some applications may find it useful to have a common way of representing these search filters in a human-readable form. This document defines a human-readable string format for representing LDAP search filters.
